		static isPrintable (line 111)
	
 
	
	

Check if the given string is "printable"


Checks that a string contains no unprintable characters. If this returns  false, encode the string for secure delivery.

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		static boolean
		
			isPrintable
		
					(string $str)
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$str			
    •
